Constructor Detail

Comms

public Comms()
      throws java.io.IOException
Create a new session with the server. Uses the argument passed in as the address to connect to. Sets the ObjectStream too.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - can't connect to the server
Method Detail

Log on to the server and get back the users reservations.

Parameters:
name - the users name

Sends Log off to the server to finish the session, then close the socket.

getAllReservationsAsStrings

public java.lang.String[] getAllReservationsAsStrings(boolean refresh)
Get local or remote reservations that are owned by this user and format them in a comma separated format.

Parameters:
refresh - use true to get new data from the server, false to use local cache
Returns:
all reservations as Strings.

getAllReservationsAsStrings

public java.lang.String[] getAllReservationsAsStrings()
Get local reservations formatted as comma separated Strings

Returns:
all reservations as Strings

sendRequest

public Response sendRequest(Request r)
Sends a Request object to the server. Ensure that it was constructed with a static string from Request. This will return null if any exception is caught.

Parameters:
r - the request
Returns:
the Response object created by the server or null.

getFilmNames

public java.lang.String[] getFilmNames()
Requests the list of films from the server, removes duplicated, then returns them as Strings.

Returns:
Film names as Strings
